summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new file attachment feature for AI Archivist and Project chat interfaces. Backend APIs working perfectly, frontend attach buttons implemented and functional.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: AI Chat RAG query sometimes returns no sources in response
flaky_endpoints.workaround: File contexts are still processed correctly, response generation works

passed_tests: Backend API: POST /api/files/upload - file upload with AI tagging working
Backend API: POST /api/projects/{id}/append - project file append working
Frontend: AI Archivist page navigation working
Frontend: AI Archivist attach button (data-testid='chat-attach-btn') visible and clickable
Frontend: AI Archivist file input (data-testid='chat-file-input') present and hidden
Frontend: Project chat view accessible with 12 projects found
Frontend: Project attach button (data-testid='project-attach-btn') visible and clickable
Frontend: Project file input (data-testid='project-file-input') present and hidden
